title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1620/1999 of 23 July 1999 amending Regulation (EC) No 2790/94 laying down common detailed rules for the implementation of Council Regulation (EEC) No 1601/92 concerning specific measures for the Canary Islands with regard to certain agricultural products
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1620/1999
of 23 July 1999
amending Regulation (EC) No 2790/94 laying down common detailed rules for the implementation of Council Regulation (EEC) No 1601/92 concerning specific measures for the Canary Islands with regard to certain agricultural products
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 23 July 1999.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
